snippet: What happened to those promises of clean government and economic revival?
abstract: Editorial holds tax evasion scandal surrounding Jerome Cahuzac, key aide to French Pres Francois Hollande, deeply undercuts Hollande's promises of clean government and economic reform; argues Hollande's presidency has so far been marked by disappointing weakness.
lead_paragraph: What happened to those promises of clean government and economic revival?

headline.seo: A Tax Scandal Adds to French Malaise
headline.main: A Tax Scandal Adds to French Malaise
headline.print_headline: A Tax Scandal Adds to French Malaise
